description: This file is a shell script that configures wireless interfaces, restarts hostapd services, modifies network configurations, and sets up DHCP and DNS services on a device. It contains functions for restarting hostapd, manipulating network interfaces, and applying network settings, primarily for router and access point configurations.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on wlan0.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts the 5G-specific hostapd service by reloading kernel modules and starting hostapd with configuration files.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills existing hostapd processes and restarts the hostapd on wlan0.
